meanings.definition: The act of providing a service that is below standard or harmful.
meanings.sent1: The disservices of the unreliable internet provider frustrated many customers.
meanings.sent2: The disservices of the negligent plumber caused more leaks in the house.
meanings.sent3: The disservices of the lazy gardener resulted in a jungle instead of a garden.
meanings.sent4: The disservices of the outdated software slowed down the entire system.
meanings.sent5: The disservices of the cheap paint job were visible within weeks.
